description: Playwright video debug page extended with cloud sync: metadata auto-imports from committed debug JSONs, videos upload to Supabase Storage via per-slot upload buttons and a bulk auto-upload action in dev.

changes.description: Rewrite video debug page with cloud sync, auto-import, and upload UI
changes.details: Removed DEV-only gate â€” page works in production for super-admins. Auto-imports debug JSONs into DB on load. Per-slot upload buttons and bulk auto-upload (dev only) push videos to Supabase Storage.

changes.description: Add playwright_run_artifacts table and playwright-recordings Storage bucket
Add playwright-runs Vite plugin static-serve support and docs source directory
changes.details: docs/playwright-runs/ is the committed source for debug JSONs; Vite copies them to public/playwright-runs/ at build time for production access.
